author: Napoleon Hill
message: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
title: Thought of the day

author: Chinese proverb
message: People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Japanese proverb
message: The day you decide to do it is your lucky day.
title: Thought of the day

author: Cicero
message: We must not say every mistake is a foolish one.
title: Thought of the day
